title: cittam karainduruga
sahitya:
cittam karainduruga sendUr murugA unnai nittam tudikkum ennai nI madikkAdadEnO


anupallavi

  uttamanillAda pittanenrE ennai tattaLikka viTTut-tAngAdadum EnO


caraNam    ettanaiyO vidattil Engit-tavittiDum attanai bhaktaraiyum AtkoLLum vaLLalE
ettanai kAlam innum enbAl un uLLam eLLaLavum irakkam koLLAdirukkumO
